content: jesse s square designer s note this square i designed to go into an afghan i made for heartmade blessings heartmadeblessings org the recipient of this afghan was jesse shores in october 2004 while on a ladder getting some information from something up on a pallet rack he slipped he hit his head on the pallet rack and fell unconscious at least 10 feet hitting his head on the concrete floor below amazingly he survived and continues to improve this square is dedicated to him finished size = approx 12 materials worsted weight yarn crochet hook size i 5 5 mm chain 4 join to form ring round 1 chain 3 11 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to top of first chain 3 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 2 half_double_crochet in same st as join chain 1 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 in each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of first chain 2 round 3 slip_stitch into next space chain 3 double_crochet in space chain 2 2 double_crochet chain 2 in each space around join with slip_stitch in top of first chain 3 round 4 slip_stitch into next space chain 1 single_crochet in space chain 5 single_crochet in next space chain 5 around join with slip_stitch into first single_crochet round 5 slip_stitch to center of next chain space chain 1 single_crochet in space chain 5 single_crochet in next space chain 5 around join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as join * 4 single_crochet in next chain 5 space 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet twice 3 single_crochet chain 2 3 single_crochet in next space single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around ending with slip_stitch into first single_crochet round 7 chain 3 double_crochet in each single_crochet around at corners work 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of first chain 3 round 8 chain 4 * skip 1 st double_crochet in next st chain 1 repeat from * around working 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corners join with slip_stitch into 3rd chain of first chain 4 round 9 slip_stitch into next space single_crochet into same space chain 3 single_crochet into next space around working single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet at the corners join with slip_stitch into first single_crochet round 10 st st into next space chain 3 half_double_crochet into next chain 3 space chain 1 around working 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet at the corners join with slip_stitch into 2nd chain of first chain 3 round 11 chain 3 double_crochet into each st and space around working 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet into each corner join with slip_stitch into top of first chain 3 round 12 chain 3 double_crochet into each st around working 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet into each corner join with slip_stitch into top of first chain 3 round 13 chain 3 double_crochet into each st around working 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet into each corner join with slip_stitch
